TestUtil v. 1.1 was released today enabling verifying all accessor 
method=
 pairs in a complete application with one line of unit test 
code.

A Verif=
ication Facilitator (VF) promotes reducing the volume of 
custom hand-codin=
g - pattern typed objects are (typically) 
reflectively interrogated and ve=
rified at runtime. An observed side-
effect of AV testing is pattern defrag=
mentation, component role 
clarification and overall design coherence. 

Te=
stUtil is a Java open source VF providing a low-effort strategy 
for unit t=
esting all matching accessor methods on mutable objects 
with a single line=
 of test code. It is compatible with both in-
container and outside-the-con=
tainer strategies built upon JUnit 
style testing. TestUtil resources (incl=
uding sample outputs) are 
available at: 

    http://gtcgroup.com/util/ind=
ex.html


As always - feedback is welcome.  Particularily on this notion of=
 
runtime verification within a JUnit context.

_Marvin
